mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE DATE(insDt) = DATE(#{date})
SELECT count(distinct o.orderNo) FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN user u on o.insId = u.id WHERE deliveryCd = '01' AND paymentCd in ('01', '02')
SELECT count(distinct o.orderNo) FROM orderInfo o LEFT OUTER JOIN user u on o.insId = u.id WHERE deliveryCd = '02' AND paymentCd in ('01', '02')
SELECT ifnull(sum(amount), 0) FROM orderInfo o WHERE DATE(orderDt) = DATE(#{date}) AND paymentCd in ('01', '02')
SELECT DATE(orderDt) as 'orderDate', sum(amount) as 'amount' FROM orderInfo o WHERE DATE(orderDt) BETWEEN DATE(#{beforeDate}) AND DATE(#{date}) AND paymentCd in ('01', '02') GROUP BY DATE(orderDt)

SELECT c.codeNm as 'categoryNm', sum(o.amount) as 'amount' FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN product p ON o.productId = p.id INNER JOIN code c ON p.categoryCd = c.code AND c.codeGbn = 'PRODUCT' WHERE DATE(orderDt) BETWEEN DATE(#{beforeDate}) AND DATE(#{date}) AND paymentCd in ('01', '02') GROUP BY c.codeNm ORDER BY amount desc LIMIT 6;
